name: Bacon and Fresh Pasta in a Jar
author: Alli Shircliff
summary: Fill a mason jar with pasta, bacon, and pea vines for a quick and easy on-the-go lunch that is perfect for a picnic!
ingredients: 1 slice cooked bacon, broken into pieces
½ teaspoon chile oil, or to taste
directions: Bring a pot of water to a boil; add fresh pasta and cook until tender, 3 to 4 minutes
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir pea vines and garlic until vines are wilted, 3 to 4 minutes
Add pasta, bacon, butter, and chile oil to pea vines mixture; toss using tongs until butter is melted
Transfer pasta mixture to a 1-pint mason jar
